name: Accessories
content:
Accessory, Helm

Name Rank PDEF MDEF Magic Initiative Price Description
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.HDTx8vtZFAgZrNuE]{Feather Hat} 1 1 0 0 0 50

Hat with feathers. Rich in variation.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.40ZpGxC8WCZ1WClg]{Willow Band} 3 2 0 0 0 60

A headband of interwoven bark.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.eboognYzA9U52tBy]{Hunter Hood} 6 3 0 0 0 120

A hunter's favorite hood. Very strong.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.4apFuzsb29ckmgs5]{Cotton Hat} 12 6 0 0 0 350

A hat sewn with thick, durable cotton to absorb shock.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.qJ4g7ljBVU7esUSW]{Traveler's Hat} 17 9 0 0 0 650

A hat with protection from sunlight, the cold of the wind, and the natural enemies of those that travel. Has a collar.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.MW2pG9myjOv8a6vf]{Silky Beret} 23 12 0 0 0 1100

A comfortable beret hat that uses plenty of precious silk thread.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.LQMRrKFhY1rSj1t8]{Rose Circlet} 28 16 0 0 0 1600

A gorgeous circlet with a rose design.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.9989oUMCNdrrOKvx]{Iron Helm} 1 2 0 0 0 60

Only Guardian and Samurai can equip this. It is quite heavy.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.fvofPk4ZnCEwL7VI]{Hachigane} 3 3 0 0 0 80

Only Samurai and Monk can equip this. Headband with iron plate.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.uwBxS460aHsBbJdW]{Bascinet} 6 6 0 0 0 160

Only Guardian and Monk can equip this. Covers the entire head.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.n29V5fvRAOX8toDg]{Black Kabuto} 12 8 0 0 0 440

Only Guardian and Samurai can equip this. Kabuto formed by stamping out thick black steel.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.FAhyA0QgKcWPhYDO]{Guardian Headwear} 17 11 0 0 0 830

Only Samurai and Monk can equip this. A headband with the emblems of prayers for various blessings on the surface.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.75jVe1qOJgpSFvMR]{Solid Crown} 23 14 0 0 0 1400

Only Guardian and Monk can equip this. Head armor made of lightweight and hard metal.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.evMcrHuqYqjLsV8q]{Great Helm} 28 18 0 0 0 2100

Only Guardian and Samurai can equip this. A sturdy helmet decorated with a crescent moon and cow horns.

Accessory, Cloak

Name Rank PDEF MDEF Magic Initiative Price Description
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.o7BzMloMPi92EN3a]{Mantle} 1 1 1 0 0 60

A good companion for trips that bring wind and rain.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.CiaWtiH8wMHILOpg]{Cape} 6 2 2 0 0 140

A short cloak. Easy to move with.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.EVMnXomVgBokyP9J]{Inverness} 13 3 3 0 0 470

A jacket that combines a long coat with a cloak that covers the shoulders.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.0zy5qpeclIKdTdsd]{Cloak} 19 5 5 0 0 940

A long cloak that wraps around your body like a bell. High heat retention.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.EwLTeRoO3xkgMKEX]{Sircoat} 25 7 7 0 0 1500

A coat that covers the upper body with a beautiful decoration that a knight would put on their armor.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.MzesD8lBO3EnEeW4]{Garbardine} 30 8 8 0 0 2200

Thick stuffed clothes with padding to wear with the armor.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.64ZtVxMWXhcnd5Ol]{Cape of Agility} 1 0 0 0 0 40

Add +1 bonus to [Athletics]. A cape that makes clothing lighter by wearing.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.49jg6rr3sToygWxx]{Feather Cape} 15 0 0 0 0 400

+2 bonus to [Athletics]. A cape that can be worn as light as a feather.

Accessory, Boots

Name Rank PDEF MDEF Magic Initiative Price Description
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.8VWJtx1yuWOZSfgW]{Leather Boots} 1 0 0 0 1 60

Tanned leather boots. Easy to walk on rough roads.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.6gKu0uZNxlRKItyP]{Greaves} 6 0 0 0 2 130

Armor protecting the bottom from history. You can take a good step with these.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.taarGkx9V5s6QjKV]{Leg Guard} 12 0 0 0 4 390

The so-called Shin Pad. Protects your knees from below
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.BeYdXySl1I1lcv0R]{Leggers} 17 1 1 0 6 730

Metal armor that protects the ankle to the knee around the shin.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.PpxW0TQp80tQowBM]{Anabasis Greaves} 23 3 3 0 6 1200

Metal armor that covers from below the knee to the instep.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.2jWhUgQ1Uj9THHzr]{Invisible Legars} 28 5 5 0 6 1800

A metal shin pad that demonstrates high protection even when used alone.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.B7apWX1fr6WGYi8k]{Boots of Endurance} 1 0 0 0 0 40

Add +1 bonus to [Endurance]. Boots that increase the physical strength of the equipment.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.TMlxdOx5Fuj5lZsN]{Iron Boots} 15 0 0 0 0 400

+2 bonus to [Endurance]. Shoes that can be as strong as iron.

Accessory, Gloves

Name Rank PDEF MDEF Magic Initiative Price Description
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.gLDKETMYCPmPa7it]{Bracer} 1 0 0 0 0 60

Add +1 to [Attack Power]. Protects the upper arm front to back.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.Hp2GbGpn5FnQTDKM]{Armguard} 6 0 0 0 0 150

Add +2 to [Attack Power]. You can attack without worrying about your hands.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.OKvWyXE6qI4qU1aE]{Vambrace} 11 0 0 0 0 370

[Attack Power] +4. A large gauntlet that protects the upper arm.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.ot4rB1TLDwNNUcHQ]{Plate Glove} 18 0 0 0 0 890

[Attack Power] +7. Arm armor made of chain mail gloves reinforced with sheet metal.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.2rpm1TwJEhedZG3W]{Fine Guard} 23 0 0 0 0 1400

[Attack Power] +10. High quality arm guard made of high quality metal.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.s1k914gBzNero7qp]{Gauntlet} 29 0 0 0 0 2200

[Attack Power] +14. A heavy gauntlet covered with sheet metal up to the joints.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.CapJLQGEVfLvidP2]{Sigil Guard} 1 0 0 0 0 60

Add +1 to [Magic Power]. Gloves with a simple magic circle.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.oRgVW3OtdFyi2WKv]{Mana Bracer} 6 0 0 0 0 150

Add +2 to [Magic Power]. A hand carved with magical pattern.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.fPXkcQB4sWRppOtB]{Magister Glove} 11 0 0 0 0 370

[Magic Power] +4. Magic amplification gloves for sorcerers.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.YE5q2cXM2yvSq12U]{Amulet Guard} 18 0 0 0 0 890

[Magic Power] +7. Gloves with magic amulets sewn in.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.fjaAZrOMKj4gZvHc]{Force Bracelet} 23 0 0 0 0 1400

[Magic Power] +10. Bracelet with jewels that amplify magic.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.kpN39TQ4VImhjJEN]{Mana Crystal} 29 0 0 0 0 2200

[Magic Power] +14. Jewelry using crystal that emits strong magic.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.D7Bal30UstK9pvbU]{Thief's Gloves} 1 0 0 0 0 40

Add +1 bonus to [Disable]. Your gloves give you a sharper fingertip and assists in precision work.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.nedvIyavGWBPRFTl]{Kaito's Gloves} 15 0 0 0 0 400

+2 bonus to [Disable]. Gloves that enable more precise work.

Accessory

Name Rank PDEF MDEF Magic Initiative Price Description
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.tfTcCluLMMurPIIZ]{Blue Flower Charm} 1 0 2 0 0 60

An amulet with bamboo leaves as a motif.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.F3f8NA7G1yTYQoNn]{Red Flower Charm} 6 0 4 0 0 140

An amulet with a flower and a leaf motif.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.0zMuDxP8nAeyXctt]{Buttercup Amulet} 12 0 6 0 0 410

A talisman with buttercups as a symbol of evil. Beautiful and poisonous.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.qa6CVNDFTfsFsq6P]{Thistle Talisman} 17 0 9 0 0 760

A talisman with a vivid thistle that protects itself with sharp sparseness.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.4W3mF1dHWuRBvM4z]{Aster Amulet} 23 0 12 0 0 1300

An amulet that uses the power of Zion, known for its medicinal properties, to exorcise it.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.NuOqAeRBpOU6zusz]{Violet Talisman} 28 0 16 0 0 1900

A small amulet with the strength of a violet that sticks to the gaps between solid rocks and withstands the snow.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.gM4TayJpMXvXOsn2]{Flame Piercing} 1 0 0 0 0 50

At the start of a scene, you gain [Cancel (Flame): 10]. At the time of purchase, you can choose a different tag, either [Cold] [Shock] [Blight] [Holy] or [Spirit], and gain [Cancel (Type): 10] instead. Record the item as '(Type) Piercing'.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.fzhEpswdlHnh5ZMD]{Flame Brooch} 6 0 0 0 0 110

At the start of a scene, you gain [Cancel (Flame): 15]. At the time of purchase, you can choose a different tag, either [Cold] [Shock] [Blight] [Holy] or [Spirit], and gain [Cancel (Type): 15] instead. Record the item as '(Type) Brooch'.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.Xb8CYMhqberMrUKE]{Flame Earrings} 12 0 0 0 0 330

At the start of a scene, you gain [Cancel (Flame): 30]. At the time of purchase, you can choose a different tag, either [Cold] [Shock] [Blight] [Holy] or [Spirit], and gain [Cancel (Type): 30] instead. Record the item as '(Type) Brooch'.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.UDKq3rlwpIdXcX8C]{Flame Talisman} 17 0 0 0 0 620

At the start of a scene, you gain [Cancel (Flame): 45]. At the time of purchase, you can choose a different tag, either [Cold] [Shock] [Blight] [Holy] or [Spirit], and gain [Cancel (Type): 45] instead. Record the item as '(Type) Brooch'.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.eQrZ98ombhfe4hWH]{Flame Belt} 23 0 0 0 0 1000

At the start of a scene, you gain [Cancel (Flame): 60]. At the time of purchase, you can choose a different tag, either [Cold] [Shock] [Blight] [Holy] or [Spirit], and gain [Cancel (Type): 60] instead. Record the item as '(Type) Brooch'.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.HxZKqsFLR49W9F5t]{Flame Medallion} 28 0 0 0 0 1600

At the start of a scene, you gain [Cancel (Flame): 80]. At the time of purchase, you can choose a different tag, either [Cold] [Shock] [Blight] [Holy] or [Spirit], and gain [Cancel (Type): 80] instead. Record the item as '(Type) Brooch'.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.xbpcOqF3yu4Bj1VL]{Monster Guidebook I} 1 0 0 0 0 40

You gain a +2 bonus to [Enemy Identification] checks. A collection of monsters regularly seen.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.vhNplWEkOxyaMk0u]{Monster Guidebook II} 15 0 0 0 0 400

You gain a +4 bonus to [Enemy Identification] checks. A picture book that covers information on rare monsters.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.ENb8EZEttPGIQkVN]{Skillful Earring} 1 0 0 0 0 40

Add +1 bonus to [Operate]. Earrings that can move you quickly and accurately.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.IS8O440B13xYixG8]{Masters Earrings} 15 0 0 0 0 400

+2 bonus to [Operate]. Jewelry that enables movement like a skilled person.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.TunBNe0fAWfv1Pag]{Necklace of Empathy} 1 0 0 0 0 40

Add +1 bonus to [Negotiate]. A necklace that makes it easier to capture the feelings of others.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.CmLTPi44nzS2oS0E]{Majestic Necklace} 15 0 0 0 0 400

+2 bonus to [Negotiate]. A necklace where you can wear irresistable dignity.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.3WgVEvodNEJHAdeo]{Piercing of Acuity} 1 0 0 0 0 40

Add +1 bonus to [Perception]. Earrings that sharpen your senses including your hearing.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.TLzqSXuqGMkGy1oQ]{Wind Foresight Piercing} 15 0 0 0 0 400

+2 bonus to [Perception]. The five senses are sharpened and small changes can be felt.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.pelYfaXXOGIzzvlj]{Encyclopedia} 1 0 0 0 0 40

Add +1 bonus to [Knowledge]. An encyclopedia covering various contents.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.HrTWmuwLzGpxdjdX]{Dictionary of the Wise Man} 15 0 0 0 0 400

+2 bonus to [Knowledge]. A book that can familiarise you with deeper knowledge of Serdesia.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.jF85IjtEGwhtu3IX]{Artisan's Glasses} 1 0 0 0 0 40

Adds +1 bonus to [Analysis]. A monocle that reflects an extensive work with details.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.xxizuoDzDSYodxmr]{Glassmaker's Glasses} 15 0 0 0 0 400

+2 bonus to [Analysis]. A work glass that allows you to see small places.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.8VfeApsmLWncuZBS]{Memento} 1 0 0 0 0 2

Something to hold on to.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.67UKK6Iyk34yQdnV]{Mask} 1 0 0 0 0 5

No mechanical effects, but might hide your identity.

Accessory, Magic Stone

Name Rank PDEF MDEF Magic Initiative Price Description

Gemstone ring dull in gray. Takes magical power.

Glossy black jewel ring. Takes magical power.

A deeply transparent gemstone ring. Takes magical power.

White shining jewel ring. Takes magical power.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.Eb85WKYtrKYS2QEe]{Golden Ring} 10 0 0 19 0 360

Gemstone ring that glows soft and yellow. It has strong magic.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.UPFiqL8EQwA89Ctl]{Orange Ring} 14 0 0 25 0 640

A jewel ring with a deep twilight color. It has strong magic.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.RIVQnHijakyd0EWC]{Red Ring} 19 0 0 34 0 1100

A gem ring that sparkles in fiery red. It has strong magic.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.accessories.LlZSB7WqNjsL449U]{Blue Ring} 24 0 0 42 0 1700
